yarn turn the work add the new color yarn onto the hook with a slipknot then attach it to the first stitch of the previous row with a slip_stitch then chain 3 or csdc to begin the new row chama valley counts as 1st stitch double_crochet in the space between the first and second stitches of the previous row this is the very first space double_crochet into each space between the stitches of the row below until you get to the last space which will be a bit smaller than the others skip this last space and double_crochet into the last stitch instead which will be the top of the starting chain from
